About

I craft digital experiences that people actually enjoy

I'm Adithya, a UX Engineer from Bengaluru, India. For more than 5 years, design has been the central piece of my world. I've moved from being a graphic designer to a full-time UX Designer and UI Engineer.

With a never-ending goal of maintaining a high standard for usability & user experience, I have consistently worked with startups and clients worldwide, helping them create unique and engaging digital products.

Currently working on the Conversational CX platform at yellow.ai as a Software Engineer (SDE-3).

Worked with

What I do

Design

User Experience, User Interface, Wireframing, Prototyping, Web Design

Development

JavaScript, React, Redux, Express, Node.js, TypeScript, Next.js, GraphQL, PostgreSQL

Got a project in mind? Let's talk.
